title: SMC_Interpolator2Dir_SlowTask (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_Interpolator2Dir_SlowTask
This FB is used for generating the reversed-path. It has been split off
from
SMC_Interpolator2Dir
in order to be called from the task
that reads the g-code and performs the path preprocessing.

rows.Name: dAngleTol
rows.Comment:
Angle tolerance for backward path. Typically the same as angle
tolerance of SMC_CheckVelocities.

rows:
This variable contains the size of the data buffer the
backward path shall be stored in. This buffer must be large enough
to hold the complete path.

Pointer to the first byte of the memory area that is
allocated for the backward path.
